module.name: Boss Secretary
module.description: The boss-secretary module creates a special ring group which includes one or more "bosses" and one or more secretaries". When someone calls the boss' extension, the secretary (or secretaries) extension will ring only, allowing the secretary to answer his or her boss' call. Only secretary ( or secretaries ) or 'thief extensions' are authorized to call directly to boss extension. With feature code you can turn on or off secretary group.
module.changelog: *1.0.2* Add support for silent ring on boss extension *1.0.1* Minor Cleanup *1.0* Module changed to new dialpan. Module is now compatible with Asterisk 1.6X and newer with all BLF functionality.
